original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields down in mid-day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields were down in the mid-day trade on Wednesday as results of a bill auction is awaited, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was quoted at 30.75/90 percent on Tuesday, down from 31.40/70 percent on Friday.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted at 27.20/28.20 percent, down from Friday’s close at 28.10/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 26.95/27.10, down from 28.00/30 percent.
“We hope to see a positive result, with investors actively participating in the bill auction” a dealer said. (Colombo/Mar 08/2023)
